author: Caroline Cukier

review: I have both an apple TV and this chromecast.  I did find the Apple TV to be very easy to install and I have a PC not a MAC.  I also installed the google chromecast.  I had difficulty with it working with my Netgear router but finally got it working.  Then I tried to stream Amazon movies and found that it wouldn't work initially - as some of the reviews have stated.  However, upon further research ,I got it to work when I followed a suggestion listed on the internet. I had to uninstall Microsoft Silverlight from the Control panel on my laptop (PC). Then I went back to Google chrome browser - then logged into amazon and started a movie.A prompt appeared that stated  I should install "Microsoft Silverlight" or I could continue using Adobe Flash. I chose using Adobe Flash. Video streaming now as I am typing this answer! Sweet!

review: Right now the abilities of Chromecast are limited. However, more apps are becoming available to cast and I see more and more becoming compatible in the future. Even with the limited apps now, Chromecast is well worth your $35 to cast Netflix, Pandora, or you can even cast your computer's desktop using an addon to Google Chrome.
